org.apache.ignite.stream.storm

Class StormStreamer<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.stream.StreamAdapter<org.apache.storm.tuple.Tuple,K,V>
      • org.apache.ignite.stream.storm.StormStreamer<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.storm.task.IBolt, org.apache.storm.topology.IComponent, org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt

    public class StormStreamer<K,V>
extends StreamAdapter<org.apache.storm.tuple.Tuple,K,V>
implements org.apache.storm.topology.IRichBolt
    Apache Storm streamer implemented as a Storm bolt. Obtaining data from other bolts and spouts is done by the specified tuple field.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
